summary: This bill, the Nutrition Counseling Aiding Recovery for Eating Disorders Act of 2025 (or Nutrition CARE Act of 2025), amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide Medicare coverage for medical nutrition therapy services for individuals with eating disorders. It defines eating disorders according to the DSM-V, specifies service hours, and outlines who can provide and refer for these services. The bill aims to improve treatment access and outcomes for those with eating disorders under Medicare.
